page.title: 09RECREATION IN HINXWORTH
page.content: ARTS AND CRAFTS: We do not have any people who make their living by their craft in our survey area nevertheless both art and craft are popular pasttimes. Many traditional crafts particularly have been revived in recent years like macrame and lacemaking and have been taught by local people at impromptu classes. We also have one very popular local hobby artist : Colin Crocker HOBBIES: We conducted a survey of people's hobbies in our area and were amazed to learn that there were at least as many different hobbies as people! Many people are involved in active sports like badminton,squash, sailing or golf. Yet the most popular were gardening, reading, sewing, knitting and walking. Other interests include philosophy, watching TV, jig- saws, photography and computing.
